sentences.sentence: But we know who was Shott and who was Nott.
sentences.translation: 但是我们知道谁是肖特，谁是诺特。

sentences.sentence: Some say Nott was not shot. But Shott says he shot Nott.
sentences.translation: 有些人说诺特并没有被射杀，但索特说他射杀了诺特。

sentences.sentence: Study on growth, yield and quality of plantlets and mocrocorm in vitro of Colocasia esculenta L. Shott cv. HY planted in continuous two years.
sentences.translation: 以茎尖培养获得的红梗芋试管苗和试管球茎为材料，在国内首次研究芋试管苗和试管球茎连续两年大田种植的生长、产量和品质情况。
